sources.full: Keys from the Golden Vault: Calling Cards

entries.name: What's your heist crew role?
entries: You can't pull off the ultimate heist without the ultimate crew. From infiltrating enemy territory to plotting out every move, each member has a different role to play. How can you best put your talents to use? Take this quiz to find out!

entries.name: Question 1: Where can you usually be found?
Question 2: How would your party describe you?
Question 3: How do you get out of a tough situation?
items: Vanish in a cloud of smoke
Create an explo—err, I mean, diversion!

entries.name: Question 4: Which animal would you Wild Shape into?
Question 5: What motto do you live by?
items: A little white lie never hurt anybody

entries.name: Question 6: You're stranded on a deserted island. What do you bring with you, and why?
items: My trusty lute, so I can serenade the fish
A chess set, so I can keep my mind sharp
My sword, so I can train my body
My horse, so I have company
A {@i totally} safe surprise, to keep things interesting!
A survival kit, so I can fend for myself

card.name: The Decoy
entries: Love to perform? Flair for the dramatic? Your task as the decoy is to divert your enemies' attention with the perfect distraction. Let jaws drop and applause ring out, until you excuse yourself and your audience realizes that their pockets are a little emptier than before...

card.name: The Demolitionist
entries: Whatever the enemy's got in store, there's nothing the demolitionist can't handle. Wall in the way? Uncrackable safe? No problem. They'll just set up their arsenal of explosives, step back, and wait for the resounding KABOOM!

card.name: The Escape Artist
entries: Daring and quick-footed, the escape artist thrives in risky situations, pocketing their treasure and slipping away in the nick of time. Even when they've been caught by their enemies, the escape artist knows that there's always a way out.

card.name: The Getaway Driver
entries: {@note Turns out WotC didn't put this one as a result in their quiz so I hope you don't need to run away...}

card.name: The Master of Disguises
entries: Venture deep into enemy territory as the master of disguises, relying on subtle misdirection to mask your true motives. If you're discreet enough, you just might uncover key information to help guide your crew to success.

card.name: The Mastermind
entries: The mastermind is the brains behind the operation, plotting out their crew's every move from start to finish. And when things inevitably go awry, they've already got a plan B and a plan C prepped and ready to go.

card.name: The Muscle
entries: As the muscle, you do the heavy lifting, whether that's carrying ten times your weight in cargo or busting some brains out. Your crew can worry about the complicated stuff—you're here to barrel forward and make things happen.
